title: Why do people hate America?
body: <a href="http://slate.msn.com/id/76886/">because of this jerk</a><br>"But the true strength of America is found in the hearts and souls of people like Travis, people who are willing to love their neighbor, just like they would like to love themselves."—W. Springfield, Mo., Feb. 9, 2004
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-03-08

Why do people hate America?
But the true strength of America is found in the hearts and souls of people like Travis, people who are willing to love their neighbor, just like they would like to love themselves.
